Description: Hey guys! I'm selling my Brian Moore i9.13 i2000 series guitar. iGuitar9.13 FeaturesComfort contoured bodyUnique scuplted headstockKalantas Mahogany body and highly figured maple top22 fret, maple neck, Satin Finish, Rosewood fingerboard25.5" scale 15" radiusSeymour Duncan pickups with coil tapping for a wide range of soundsGold HardwareSperzel Locking Tuners for precision tuning and easy string changesStandard VibratoInnovative output jack locationRMC piezo (via stereo 'Y' cable) for warm, authentic acoustic tone13pin RMC system for fast tracking access to Roland and compatible 13pin guitar processorsNo need for externally mounted synth pickup.Improved tracking over externally mounted magnetic hex pickups.Compatible with all 13 pin guitar synth products.All 13pin sounds can be blended with the magnetic pickups. Everything works. Gorgeous green flame maple top. The action is set very low. This is an easy to play, versatile, guitar made with quality woods, electronics and hardware. Seymour Duncan, I believe JB in the bridge, Alnico II in the neck, and Seymour Duncan single in the middle, can't remember the model. Sperzel locking tuners. Comes with a Brian Moore hardshell case. ***********************************************************************************************************Issues: - The tone knob can fall out. Seems to be broken from whatever is holding it to the system. It's not a normal pot. It still works, and there may be an easy fix, or at least easy way to rig it to not fall out inadvertently. - Hardware is tarnishing as seen in the pictures. It doesn't look bad from a few feet away, but it's not shiny and new by any means, so if that bothers you please don't bid or buy it now. ************************************************************************************************************ This guitar would make for an awesome Christmas surprise. Shipping will be $50 through UPS ground, contiguous USA only. If you are in AK or HI please ask before bidding. shipping will be more. I do not ship outside of the USA. Payment through Paypal only, unless picking up locally with cash. If you have any questions or concerns, please ask before bidding or hitting the buy it now. Thanks for looking and Merry Christmas!
Title: Brian Moore i9.13 i2000 Piezo Synth Green Flame Top Sperzel Seymour Duncan
